body_html:
@feihugis
Thank you for your quick and accurate reply.
It was because the shuffled dataset was shuffled again when calling map.
I understand that we can call map on dataset cached with .cache() or dataset shuffled with same seed.
Close this issue.

body:
@feihugis 
Thank you for your quick and accurate reply.
It was because the shuffled dataset was shuffled again when calling map.
I understand that we can call map on dataset cached with `.cache()` or dataset shuffled with same seed.
Close this issue.
